Prerequires
===========

Python
------

CouchDB
-------
CouchDB is a document oriented database. Here are some useful resources:

* http://www.unixgarden.com/index.php/web/couchdb-la-base-de-donnees-qui-change-tout (fr)

Django
------

CouchDBKit
----------

http://couchdbkit.org/

Restructured Text
-----------------

http://docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html
